question: It is becoming increasingly popular for people to travel to tourist destinations during public holidays.What problems does this cause?What solutions are there to these problems?
text: Now a day’s people love to visit different sorts tourist destination like different places which have various kinds of monuments, palaces, sculpture or different destination which has natural beauty, during their public holidays. People who are travelling to different places during their weekend or holidays, can also cause lots of problems.

Firstly, tourist attraction has become very crucial this day in the world. People from different countries travel to different places to relax themselves, due to this, it also helps to generate more money and helps the government to generate more revenue from this tourist destination. People travelling to different places during public holidays and weekend can also cause problems. Problems can be anything like people who are visiting old palaces, caves, sculptures or temple, can damage this places. For example - spitting in public places, on the walls, people may also cause damage to the monuments or not throwing garbage in the dustbins, due to this it looks very dirty and uneven.

Secondly, there are various solutions to deal with this kinds of problems. Like government should take certain steps like charging fine for people who causes damage to public places. More awareness should be done through various advertisements, by different holding advertisements or union can bring celebrities to do this advertisements or campaign so that people can understand easily.
Lastly, there is always a solution for different problems, but it all depends on us that how we are changing it and following rules and regulations guided by the union.
